summary: REQ-6 appears partially addressed by removing an unused import in App.tsx, but overall build/lint success cannot be confirmed from the diff. REQ-7 is only partially implemented: the backend readiness query exists but does not return a status/version string as required. REQ-8 is indicated in the file summary but is not visible in the truncated LandingPage diff, so implementation cannot be verified from provided evidence.

missing_requirements.requirement: Backend exposes at least one query method that returns the caller Principal (or its text form) and a static status/version string.
missing_requirements.reason: The backend query method returns only a Principal and does not include any status/version string in its return value.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add a clearly labeled “How to publish” help section in the frontend UI with step-by-step guidance in English and a brief troubleshooting checklist.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff for LandingPage.tsx is truncated before any 'How to publish' section is shown; the only mention is in a separate summary file, which is not direct code evidence of the UI content.

hallucinated_features.description: Splash screen added/used in the main App layout (showSplash state and SplashScreen rendering).
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest focuses on publish blockers, readiness check, and a 'How to publish' section; it does not request adding or integrating a splash screen.

hallucinated_features.description: Footer branding/attribution linking to caffeine.ai (including heart icon text).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by any of REQ-6/REQ-7/REQ-8.
